scripts.test: npm run transpile && npm run unit_test && npm run testv2
scripts.petstore: npm run transpile && node test_v1/index.mjs https://petstore3.swagger.io/api/v3/openapi.json petstore
scripts.github: npm run transpile && node test_v1/index.mjs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/github/rest-api-description/main/descriptions/api.github.com/api.github.com.json github
scripts.testv1: npm run transpile && node test_v1/index.mjs ./test_v1/spec01.json spec01 && node test_v1/index.mjs ./test_v1/spec02.json spec02
